website_summaries.verdict: An extremely strong set of two D-rings from a company that stands behind the product. Suitable for off-road towing and recovery.
cons: Rare reports of rust in spite of powder coating

customer_reviews.title: Not USA made and that information is not included
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. I would have preferred to know that, and would have changed suppliers had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Ken McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Not American made as led to believe
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these shackles because I wanted shackles that were 100% American made - these are not. It was of critical importance to me that it be American metal - so I returned them for a refund and purchased Crosby shackles.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shackle, but quick to rust.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Shackles as described, though not really any different than any other shackle, except it says Rhino. I paid extra to get these hoping the powder coating would keep them from rusting. First rain, not ever having been used, rust appeared in the eye hole. They should ecoat, with a zinc phosphate pretreat, then powder coat to make this a great product. Military surplus may be a better option, and paint over the CARC.
customer_reviews.author: David Mason

customer_reviews.title: Geat product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use them yet " for their intended purpose". But they are mounted on my front bumper and since they're made in the USA I have no doubt they will work just fine. I support American businesses whenever possible.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shackles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the company is an American company, these are made in the United States, and because of their breaking point. I got them on a Thursday and was using them that Saturday, the performed perfectly. If you're looking for a set of 3/4 inch shackles, these are the ones to get. Update June 1st, 2017. These are still working great, so good that I ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: 95XJ

customer_reviews.title: You could do worse.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy, very thick coating. Look like they will hold up as advertized although I haven't had a chance to use them yet. Fit and finish is at least as good as higher-priced shackles I've seen at my local S&M Bondage store and I think they'll go well with that early 20th century farmhouse basement steam radiator theme or in any safe house as well. Finding chain and manacles to match might be a chore, but look around.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Paine

customer_reviews.title: Pulled a semi out of the sand
customer_reviews.text: First time using my strap was to help pull a semi tractor and trailer out of a sandy area at the "King of the Hammers " race event, it was hooked to a cat tractor and pulled the semi out without a problem, great product and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Racing

customer_reviews.title: Quickly rusts.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package I noticed that the finish was full of pinholes with bare metal showing. After a month in the storeage compartment in the back of my hardtop wrangler, it is covered in rust. Nothing a little prep and paint can’t fix, but not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great Shackles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different sets of shackles: one from Rhino and another brand. They are both shackles, but the ones from Rhino have a superior coating. The others you can see where they hung them when coated, whereas the Rhino have an even coat. I will be playing in the mud this weekend so if I get my jeep stuck, I will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: AviatorX25

customer_reviews.title: The Quality of these shackles are obvious right pits
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I received my shackles from Rhino USA, and I have to say that I'm thoroughly impressed. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because I haven't actually used them yet. However, I've been in the business 21 years, and I know quality equipment when I see it. When I finally put my shackles to work, I have absolutely no doubt that they will perform exactly as they're supposed to. Without having used them yet, I would recommend them. (I actually already told my brother about them) I'm sure he's going to get some too.
customer_reviews.author: OMAR

customer_reviews.title: good quality ! oil thread's and bald end !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to argue, true USA. made or not,, good quality,, however, with Metal/steel, tool's, ,, in this case, thread's, you MUST OIL THREAD'S !! and inside bald end !! protective spray, can not reach these part's, and must be heavy oil'ed !!! Manufacturers used to stress this !! on ALL metal/steel tool's !!!! you oil fine tool's !! period !! (or will rust ! ) ,,, and if a D ring hitch, must oil center of hitch too !!! otherwise, all good !! (oil'ed Fine tool's, will last forever ! ).., since purchase, I've added the plastic protection, it just help's keep ding's and minor scratches, but does look KOOL ! LOL
customer_reviews.author: david. p

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I own a number of Rhino products and find them to be a great value. I needed shackles to accompany a winch install and these fit the bill. I own one that I used a few years ago to pull a friend out of a mud hole he intentionally got stuck in. It didn't let me down then, so I looked for them when I needed to buy more. The finish is holding up well (and I can't say that for the receiver-mount piece). No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love the entire Rhino product line
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Rhino products and evidently so does a teen who decided to take one of my D Ring Shackles right off my truck in the Walmart parking lot. I have not had a chance to put any of the products to test yet, but the presentation and Life Time Warranty are great. I have had the need in the past to help others when off road, and I'm sure I will have a need in the future. I'm actively going out looking for opportunities to use my New Rhino Products.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK LINHART

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Highly doubt I will need these. But if I do their a good addition to my tool and safety kit in my truck. We get crazy weather here nice to have some good recovery equipment for the roads. That said packaging was on point ! Dose that matter ? Yes ! Take pride in your product. For a few dollars or cents more make the presentation enjoyable. Emailing me to confirm I’m happy with the product and there are no issues 👍 As far as durability I don’t have any doubt they will do the job and stand up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dusenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I'd like to give a 5 but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I'd like to give a 5 but just my peeve, I was expecting a left and right ring. The bolts are on the same side. You can't install the bolts both facing out or in without the Rhino name on one ring facing in. Also, if you install them with the stamped Rhino name facing out it's upside down. Now that I just took a couple of pictures, I realized within the two weeks I've had them on I'm already seeing signs of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Rewire

customer_reviews.title: Great products, great company, great service
customer_reviews.text: D-rings aren't the most technical or complicated thing you'll ever buy. But quality shines above cheapness in almost anything you buy. That holds true with Rhino products. I'm a repeat customer and I'll continue to give Rhino preference over other brands for the things they sell. Quality and Service are the reason I'm a happy Rhino customer and will recommend their products to others.
customer_reviews.author: PRussell23

customer_reviews.title: awesome shackles, used them the other day for storm ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome shackles, used them the other day for storm clean -up, branches, brush and what not. worked great, saved a boatload of time sinching up tree limbs, hauded out a pile bigger than the truck, have not used them for recovery yet but I know they will be perfect. the boys at the shop asked where I got them, I proudly told them about you guys, so look for referral orders from me,(send my check,hehe). I put the rhino sticker on the back of my truck, thanks guys, you ROCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN DA FIX IT GUY

customer_reviews.title: Reliable recovery gear
customer_reviews.text: I've used this four times so far. Wrapped the strap around rocks and trees to either put non-running vehicles in position, or recover stuck ones. It's held up really well! The shackles are super tough, but you'll need a larger hook than most winches and come-alongs have to attach to them. The whole kit is well made and has performed flawlessly, which is exactly what you want in recovery gear!
customer_reviews.author: John Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shackles!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to put them to use yet, but they look and feel heavy duty. I bought these along with a Sunferno 35,000lb tow/recovery strap with the idea that if anything breaks hopefully the strap would fail before the 41,000lb shackles, But I honestly don't see breaking either with how I intend to use them. Rhino also makes nice dirt bike tie downs FYI. Seems to be a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Armed36

customer_reviews.title: These things are bomb proof!
customer_reviews.text: I use one of these on my draw bar on my John Deere tractor and the other is used on my winch on my Bronco. They work well in both cases and you can tell the difference between the Rhino's and the kind you get at the discount stores. The pin remains smooth after using and doesn't drag on the threads. So far the finish has remained in tact and I have no complaints. I am looking at ordering several other items from these guys. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Love my D Rings
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys, Just wanted to thank everybody there for such awesome service and a great product! These D Rings are much better than I expected. As soon as I got them and ran right out and installed them and I love them. I will for sure be ordering more from you In the future as you have me as a customer for life
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Rhino D ring shackles
customer_reviews.text: Life time warranty, what more could you ask for. I was looking for a shackle that would meet my needs and possibly a larger vehicle for recovery. I read reviews on Amazon and other websites to see pro's and cons. For price/capability/warranty, Rhino beat competitors hands down. Have not had to use them yet but living in Alaska, but if I do need to use it has to be able to handle extremely cold temps (-20 to -50 degrees) and mud that acts like glue in summer.
customer_reviews.author: DmaninFBKS

customer_reviews.title: Strong hooks
customer_reviews.text: I finaly had a chance to use these, with my truck in 4wd and the hooks securing the chain, I jerked a 500+ lb root ball out of the ground after Irma. We did have to use the chain saw to cut roots then give it another jerk till we got it out of the ground. Then I drug it with the chain about 50 yards up to the road. They had to use a crane to get it into the truck. None of that seemed to stress the hooks at all. And I've straightened out hooks before pulling lesser things.
customer_reviews.author: H Trans Svcs

customer_reviews.title: The shackles look nice but the bolt is bigger than it says and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shackles look nice but the bolt is bigger than it says and didn't fit the 3/4" eyehole on my bumper
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: These look great and workgreat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because one of my old D-Rings fell off. I also wanted to get some that matched my Jeep. They have been on my Jeep for a long time. They still look great. I check them every so often to make sure they are tight so they do not fall off. They are easy to use when hooking up to the winch for recoveries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premium price for shackles made in China
customer_reviews.text: They make it sound like they are made in USA. They aren't. But they charge a premium price as if they were made in the USA. Save yourself money and buy some of the $16 ones instead -- they're likely just as good Or, spend lots more for shackles actually made in the USA. Very disingenuous advertising.
customer_reviews.author: ronswines

customer_reviews.title: Holy super shackles, Batman
customer_reviews.text: If you can’t successfully pull whatever you’re trying to pull with these on the job, it sure ain’t the shackles fault. Maybe you need a manlier truck. lol They’re built like an Abrams tank. Weigh about five pounds each. Solid as a rock. The hardware is equally heavy duty and smooth as silk in operation. All around excellent gear. Made in the USA 🇺🇸. Highly recommend. Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: MooseTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: But I will say these 3/4" shackles appear to be of excellent quality compared to others in the same price range
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these hoping the shackle pin would be larger. The add did not have the dimensions so I took a shot on them. I actually needed 7/8" shackles. But I will say these 3/4" shackles appear to be of excellent quality compared to others in the same price range. The powder coat is very nice and consistent. I will keep these with my other recovery equipment to use as needed. The larger shackles that I purchased will stay on the bumpers. If they offered a 7/8" shackle I would buy them in a heart beat and replace what I currently have.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product and great folks
customer_reviews.text: It's the dead of winter and seemed like a recovery package needed to be added to my truck's toy box. I haven't used the product yet, but everything arrived as described, looks to be in perfect order. I must comment that I would not have expected shackles and receiver adapter to have arrived in a presentation quality box. Nice touch. The pragmatist in me says maybe it's a bit over the top for indestructible steel shackles, but I also must admit that I'll now likely leave them under the seat of my truck in those clank proof boxes until I need them, so maybe it's not over the top at all. Good job Rhino!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Packaging and Presentation
customer_reviews.text: These fit and look great. Install in seconds and the finish is excellent. Picking up a second pair to replace my worn out set on the rear bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Research proper tow ring placement
customer_reviews.text: Do what they say they do, however a lot of different ways to employ them. The manufacturers suggest one way, however; professionals, CHP, off- road enthusiasts, Caltrans, most D.O.T. authorities all agree that the mode to employ is inherently wrong in the manufacturer. It comes down to the placement of the rings.
customer_reviews.author: Kalen Heid

customer_reviews.title: Strong and great and helped me out of a bog!
customer_reviews.text: I got a tow strap and these shackles were 'recommended' - glad I got them because I needed a tow out of a muddy field the first day I got them! The farmer with his big tractor was *very impressed* with my tow strap/shackle setup and it took him one tug to get me out of a real jam!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: SOLID HEAVY SHACKLE
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome shackle. Bigger and stronger than any I've felt or seen before. Can't imagine it ever failing. Great customer service and follow-through. Has your company thought of manufacturing custom high grade rubber protectors that can be attached to your shackles to prevent metal on metal and less paint surface wear?
customer_reviews.author: Nickki

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: First, I liked the name-RhinoUSA, second I felt good about supporting the family business in CA, then I get the product and see it's made in China. They bailed on me in the last step-manufacturing- in their USA-themed product. Yes, it was engineered in USA but the manufacturing part is where America needs it's companies to step up. I would pay the extra $ for that!
customer_reviews.author: Normal Guy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy, not cheap junk scrap metal. Install is quick and easy. I had to loosen my brush guard to get them on, but that's the shape of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Appears well made.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these, and haven't had a chance to use them. (If life goes according to plan, I may never get a chance. But I never would have bought these if life life ever followed the plan.) None the less, these appear well made, and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Tyler

customer_reviews.title: These shackles could pull a house off it's foundation without breaking!
customer_reviews.text: These shackles were bought as an aid for connecting A Rhino USA heavy duty tow strap to snatch roots out of my flower beds. May have been an overkill for my job but it got the job done. Positive - the shackles worked great and I didn't have to make but one trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these awhile ago and never used until this month! Eastern Washington got hit with almost a foot and a half of snow with about 4 foot snow drifts. Was able to use the D shackles and a recovery strap to help pull out 6 cars from the snow. Hooks were Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shackles for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the shackle set and products shipped very quickly. Shackles appear to be of excellent quality and coating is good. Rating is clearly marked and have confidence these will help get me out of a jam when I’m stuck. Also ordered a tow rope. Rhino USA has very good customer service and is proactive reaching out about warranty and satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made in the USA at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Properly heavy, well-made shackles with an excellent, consistent finish -- the screw threads don't get gummed up. An essential piece of towing & recovery gear for a very reasonable price. Could have saved a few bucks on a Chinese-made one, but...why bother? Better to keep Americans at work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paxton

customer_reviews.title: They come packed better than some of my computer components
customer_reviews.text: Crazy! They come packed better than some of my computer components. I was truly impressed. They are powder coated and excellent quality. I used them to lift 30' Gin poles in the air. I used 2 and 3" straps in the clevace and there was plenty of room. Would definitely recommend for heavy duty jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P.

customer_reviews.title: Made in America
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Rhino USA. I purchased these to use along with my Rhino tow strap. Both will be used with my winch on my Jeep. I am a member of a local Offroad Adventure Club and offroad driving school and look forward to putting these to the test. They appear well built with a great tough coating. American made!
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: how it holds up
customer_reviews.text: neither like or dislike the items, they look strong durable, still have yet to set the cable on the winch to use them, I am sure they will hold up
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid American Made construction
customer_reviews.text: Always impressed by the quality of the products I buy from Rhino. For a small family business they do first rate presentation and packaging. The D ring shackles are a deep high gloss black. Hope I never have to test the break strength of 41,000 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Charge more and actually make it in America
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t like companies pasting the The USA, The Flag and America all over the packaging and then sticking a sticker over the Made in China label.
customer_reviews.author: John T Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China : (
customer_reviews.text: Made in China... Seriously? Talk about false advertising. Wish I would have know before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to recovery points on our T4R. Only expected to use if in an emergency but well built and should last
customer_reviews.author: Sean O

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong can’t believe the price of these just to buy one close to this size at our local tractor supply is $20 it’s not the same brand but I am very pleased with these have used a few times now and no issues. Loved the box they came in too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China...
customer_reviews.text: Don't be misled by the product name or the advertising. These are made in China...
customer_reviews.author: Old Duffer

customer_reviews.title: If it had Rhino’s name on it it’s good to go!
customer_reviews.text: Rhino USA your stuff has yet to disappoint me. Thanks for offering excellent gear.
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser77

customer_reviews.title: Good quality D Rings
customer_reviews.text: Good quality D Rings. I recommend purchasing the plastic 'silencers' to keep them from rattling.
customer_reviews.author: E. F. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I've already had to use these bad boys to rescue a friend. Held strong!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Safety kit - very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a recovery strap, hitch receiver and a pair of D-rings. Shipped out VERY quickly, packed tight, and all parts are great quality. Warranty registration was very easy and quick. Will update review when (not if!) I use the gear!
customer_reviews.author: S. O'

customer_reviews.title: I like that everything fits and actually works
customer_reviews.text: I rated you guys 5 stars fast shipping since I live on a Mountain. I like that everything fits and actually works. Thank you very much. Continue to have great products and people will continue to buy from you. Gorilla Moto Gear has great prices with high quality. Rough and Tough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shackles quality look great. Haven’t needed to use them
customer_reviews.text: Shackles quality look great. Haven’t needed to use them. They seem durable and the company emails you to make sure the prodcut has arrived and in good condition. Packaging was by far some some of the best making sure they are not damaged. The shackles and rhino tow strap fit perfectly in the floor board cubby of my 2016 ram 1500. Thank you Rhino for the great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Avila

customer_reviews.title: Proud to buy American made
customer_reviews.text: Great solid product and the bonus being an American made product from a family run business. They have great prices on all their products. I bought their tow strap along with the shackles. I haven’t had the chance to actually use the product and im hoping I wont ever have to, but definitely feel ready if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: TPAGE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: While I've not loaded these up to the maximum rating, they did work well to hook up a tow rope to my Chevy Colorado. Easy to put on and take off when they are not needed.
customer_reviews.author: K&R in SD

customer_reviews.title: High strength and great fit.
customer_reviews.text: The shackles are large and when I first opened them I thought they were to large but they fit perfect. Our outback got stuck in the snow and the tow rod hole is small so it is hard to find someone to pull you out. This shackle fits perfectly and you are able to get a tow strap on it. Great product Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Grinch

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Tremendous customer service as the company owners communicate by email to the purchaser both while the product is in transit and after arrival, to insure satisfaction. Quality appears undisputed. Bomb-proof by appearance.
customer_reviews.author: DrD

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go along with the Rhino recovery strap and shackle hitch receiver. I have not had the opportunity to utilize any of them yet but I'm happy with the build quality and will have no trouble trusting them to do their job when that time arises.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: arrived like expected
customer_reviews.text: Very hard for me to believe these aren't made in China instead of being made by a father and son team in the US but I have no reason to doubt them.
customer_reviews.author: rob sold

customer_reviews.title: USA proud
customer_reviews.text: Glad I spent a little more for a USA made product. While I haven't had to use these for recovery yet, they seem very well made. The packaging is way better then the cheapo stuff and it comes with a sticker! I LOVE STICKERS! Life time warranty and plenty of follow up from the company. Would buy Rhino again
customer_reviews.author: Noah216

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes how these look on his truck.
customer_reviews.text: My husband fixed up his truck and when he saw these, he had to have them. They do look nice and so easy to install. Now his truck is complete.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: These ride with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: These are in my pickup at the ready at all times. They are great and work well. I have used them to pull trees and vehicles. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Heath Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shackle, Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great packaging and correct dimensions where it fits my Factor 55 Flat Link. I had some cheaper made D ring shackles that dimensions were off and they would not fit my Flat Link. Seemingly excellent customer service, as I have received several follow up emails asking if I received my product and I was satisfied with it. Nice touch by allowing you to register for the warranty with a simple text message. My only wish, is that they offered these in other colors. My Jeep is black with red accessory accents. I would have liked to have had the option of ordering these with a red finish. Overall great product and is already on my Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Rhino products for life
customer_reviews.text: A+ all the way it’s why I only order rhino products when it comes to the reliability and and sturdiness of a product they are simply unmatched
customer_reviews.author: pems-integ-tests

customer_reviews.title: Great rings. And made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are aesthetically pleasing and sturdy. Pretty sure my jeep will pull in two before these things give out. No trouble with them clanging or coming loose while driving. Can't wait to give them a good pull next time I'm out wheeling.
customer_reviews.author: Triple-A

customer_reviews.title: Quality and ease of use/install
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these in my enclosed trailer with Rhino axle straps to secure a 66 Ford F100 pick-up/custom hot rod. The truck weight is 4000lbs. While I have not used them yet but have examined them. They look very capable of handling the weight and prevent movement inside the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Craig G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rings
customer_reviews.text: These are rings are great and heavy. I put them on a bumper I built quickly for a trip to a new offroad park nearby. Can't beat them for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jordie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great price and much heavier capacity than other similarly priced options!
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Rhino dependable quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wrangler I have switched to Rhino D rings. They are great although I haven't really tried out the new set yet. I was so impressed when I purchased Rhino straps that whenever possible I will buy Rhino again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Wolverton

customer_reviews.title: Just what you’re looking for
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, will definitely get the job done WHEN I do eventually get stuck, I even like the soft foam pads they ship in, left them in there and put them under my seat to keep them from shifting around and beating things up
customer_reviews.author: Mason Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use them yet but appear to be excellent quality and just what I was looking to go with my tow stap
customer_reviews.author: James R. Eason, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems nice, came in a well packaged box. I’d buy again for my rear bumper once that comes in. I bought a pair of Rhino shackles from my front bumper on a Jeep Wrangler. Fits a Poison Spyder Brawler Lite no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are HEFTY!
customer_reviews.text: Immediately as you pick them up, you can tell these aren't your average hardware/tractor store shackles. They are HEAVY and just feel tough. And the packaging and box really show how this company cares and values their product and getting it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Excellent customer-service (follow-up) from the company regarding receipt of the product, and satisfaction with purchase. The product is sturdy and as-billed (heavy duty). I would recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: JH60N

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely well built so I give it 4 stars but it’s MADE IN CHINA and that information isn’t anywhere on the package had I known that I would not have bought however I bought a few and used them to pull out my f250 plenty of times with a rhino strap too they work but the people who own this company are as good as communists to me
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Smeja

customer_reviews.title: Mandatroy item for truck aand camper owners
customer_reviews.text: You just never know when you gonna use it. Did the ultimate test and hooked it up to a tree stump with the rhino strap. Could not pull the tree out but could not tear it apart either. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amnon Feiner

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty product that's well built and looks to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to pull a 1967 Nova out of my garage. I didn't realize I could also use them to pull an M1Abrams tank. I find them extremly impressive and have absolute faith than they can handle the Nova. Nice product, great presentation. I'll be sure to put them in my will to pass on to my son, these will last forever. Lastly, what else do you make I'd like to see more. John L Retired Madison Police Officer
customer_reviews.author: John Labarbera

customer_reviews.title: Great American made production
customer_reviews.text: Great American made production. Put them on my F150. I'll be buying another set for a buddy for his birthday (he just bought a ZR2).
customer_reviews.author: TwoNiner

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Use these on my Jeep (For Looks) and they look great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Randall Butts

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product highly impressed would highly recommend anybody doing serious lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Tough yet stylish
customer_reviews.text: Obviously strong, nevertheless, the shape and finish are stylish. The glossy black coating holds up even after use.
customer_reviews.author: andro

customer_reviews.title: great packaging, prompt shipping
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to test the product, but from initial inspection it looks well made and that it will be up to the job. Very impressed with shipping and presentation. That definitely makes a favorable first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Heiko Scherrer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but rusts
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, have held up under significant stress - snatched an F-250 out of mud, several Jeeps, etc. Only complaint is rust building up very quickly
customer_reviews.author: MichaelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: All Around Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product Always expect nothing but perfection from Rhino USA. I got this on time and they followed up with me to see if I had received the item. Amazing Shackles Amazing performance!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Baume

customer_reviews.title: Well made but too large for my winch hook.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know but the d rings come in different sizes.My hook was too small but they appear to be very well made and eventually i can use them so i will keep them.They look very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Beast

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had bought these in case we needed them when we went driving on the beach, as a precaution. They were as described, and we are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding American made product at a very reasonable price..!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these first and foremost because they're made in the USA...their rated quite high and finished nicely, but for me, I'll buy USA made before anything else..and yes, there are cheaper D-rings out there. Support your local merchants...buy American..!!
customer_reviews.author: unklgreg

customer_reviews.title: I love this company
customer_reviews.text: I love this company. I have a lot of their accessories on my FJ Cruiser. They all seem to work together as a unit really well. For instance, the ski/fishing rod holder actually secures the luggage rack onto the roof bars further, making the whole thing even more solid. Their winch accessories are well thought out and executed. On top of that, their prices are fair, not cheap,but fair, as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Lohrer

customer_reviews.title: Great company buy you wont be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, and packaging is top notch!! Above and beyond for what product is.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA. And a family business
customer_reviews.text: First of all I would like to say family business and made in the USA. Plus the product is high quality looks good very sturdy. I installed it on my 2016 Jeep Wrangler on front and back bumper exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rhino 3/4" Shackles
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, perfect addition to my towing/recovery items. The powdercoat finish is an added bonus! Thank you Ted and crew for ALL of your great products!
customer_reviews.author: YerDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Being made in the USA is what made me buy these. This company is great, they have lifetime warranty, and quality products. Since this purchase I have bought several other items from Rhino USA and everything the make is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used these yet but they look very stout and no doubt they will get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I am totally confident they will handle any towing or pulling required.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the tow strap and shackles yet but I am totally confident they will handle any towing or pulling required. These are better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Piece of Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Strong, sturdy, and the bolt is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Zonerdorf

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality - repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made shackles. They have a great finish and are solidly built. This is an extra set I purchased. Quality made in the USA. Even the packaging is happy.
customer_reviews.author: C Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Rhino!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Durable, strong and reliable. They look great on my 4Runner TRD PRO!
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Serious Shackles, for Serious Off Roaders
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt. The best shackles for all offroaders, and anyone. Needing a quality shackle. When anything less is just unacceptable ! Don't trust your safety to other lesser quality goods. These are MADE IN AMERICA !
customer_reviews.author: No Prob Bob
